name: Application svc Pattern
desc: Pattern for creating ABP application svc

rules.mapping: Use ObjectMapper to map between Domain entities and DTOs

methods.signature: Task<{DtoName}> GetByIdAsync(Guid id, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)
Task<PagedResultDto<{DtoName}>> GetListAsync({ListRequestDto} input, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)
Task<{DtoName}> CreateAsync({CreateDto} input, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)
Task<{DtoName}> UpdateAsync(Guid id, {UpdateDto} input, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)
Task DeleteAsync(Guid id, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

methods.pattern: public async Task<{ReturnType}> {MethodName}Async({Parameters}, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default) { _logger.LogStart(); try { // Call domain svc // Map to DTO using ObjectMapper // Return DTO } catch (Exception ex) { _logger.Capture(ex); throw; } finally { _logger.LogFinish(); } }
